profile:
Most Framed Basements For $2500 that includes Material
Hello I am a Framer, and have had my framing company for several years I have experience in framing basements and finishing basements. Our business philosophy  has always been rather simpleâ€¦be honest, be fair, deliver top quality workmanship and strive to achieve a stress-free experience for our customers.If your in need of any framing or basement jobs big or small please e-mail me for a quote or call 905-518-9202 

By hiring us to frame the basement there are three big positives for you the home owner- 

1. Cut out the middle man(contactor) and contact out the work yourself. 

2.With us doing the framing, if you are a DIY type of person you can finish the rest of the basement on your own. 

3. Money is aways a big issue when it comes to finishing the basement so we have made it easier for you by doing the framing and than you can do the rest of the basement in stages as it becomes more affordable. 

 
Here are some of our before and after pics, references and other pictures apon request (also we are fully bonded and have WSIB clearence)
Please give us a call at (905) 518-9202  UNITED CUSTOM FRAMING
